platen-tab-entry.title: Tab
platen-tab-entry.description: Add another tab to existing tabbed content; only valid in an existing tabs shortcode.

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name: Specify a name for the tab. May include Markdown. This value is mandatory if id isn't specified.

fields.name: id
fields.title: ID: Specify the tab's ID. This value is mandatory if name isn't specified.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List: Specify any classes to add to the tab in a space-separated list.
